BR.name: Turtle Tale
BR.description: Turtle Island foi invadida por piratas, e cabe a você impedir eles! Capitão O'Haire e sua gangue de Macacos Piratas chegaram e tomaram a Turtle Island. Armado com sua arma de água de confiança, Shellon parte em uma aventura para recuperar seu lar, impedindo qualquer um que fique em seu caminho! Com controles intuitivos e gráficos cheios de cores, Turtle Tale é um jogo de plataforma 2D clássico que fãs de jogos antigos irão amar. Características Jogabilidade 2D clássica, inspirada por nossos jogos de plataforma favoritos! Viaje através de cinco áreas diferentes de Turtle Island. Trilha sonora envolvente.

CA.name: Turtle Tale
CA.description: Turtle Island has been invaded by pirates, and it's up to you to stop them! Captain O'Haire and his gang of Monkey Pirates have sailed in and taken over Turtle Island. Armed with his trusty water gun, Shelldon sets out on an adventure to reclaim his home, stopping anyone who gets in his way! With intuitive controls and colorful graphics, Turtle Tale is a classic 2D platformer that fans of retro games will love. Features Classic 2D gameplay, inspired by our favorite retro platformers! Travel through five unique areas of Turtle Island. Catchy and colorful soundtrack.

MX.name: Turtle Tale
MX.description: Turtle Island ha sido invadida por piratas y solo tú puedes salvarla. El capitán O'Haire y su banda de monos piratas han atracado en Turtle Island y la han invadido. Shelldon, armado con su infalible pistola de agua, se embarcará en una aventura para recuperar su hogar sin permitir que nadie se interponga en su camino. Los controles intuitivos y los gráficos vibrantes hacen de Turtle Island un juego de plataformas en 2D clásico que encantará a los amantes de los juegos retro. Características Modo de juego en 2D clásico inspirado en nuestros juegos de plataforma favoritos. Viaja a través de cinco zonas singulares de Turtle Island. Banda sonora pegadiza y variada.

US.name: Turtle Tale
US.description: Turtle Island has been invaded by pirates, and it's up to you to stop them! Captain O'Haire and his gang of Monkey Pirates have sailed in and taken over Turtle Island. Armed with his trusty water gun, Shelldon sets out on an adventure to reclaim his home, stopping anyone who gets in his way! With intuitive controls and colorful graphics, Turtle Tale is a classic 2D platformer that fans of retro games will love. Features Classic 2D gameplay, inspired by our favorite retro platformers! Travel through five unique areas of Turtle Island. Catchy and colorful soundtrack.
